locations.Dodongos Cavern Compass Chest:
can_reach(Adult_DC) or has_sticks or 
                (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (has_slingshot or has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword))
locations.GS Dodongo's Cavern East Side Room:
can_reach(Adult_DC) or
                has_explosives or has_slingshot or Boomerang or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword
locations.DC Deku Scrub Deku Sticks:
can_reach(Adult_DC) or
                has_slingshot or has_sticks or has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword

exits.Dodongos Cavern Climb:
(can_reach(Adult_DC) or 
                    ((has_sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and 
                        (has_slingshot or has_sticks or has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword))) and 
                (has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or 
                    can_use(Dins_Fire) or (logic_dc_staircase and can_use(Bow) and can_reach(Adult_DC)))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Far Bridge:
(can_reach(Child_DC) and can_use('Slingshot') and (has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)) or
                (can_reach(Adult_DC) and
                 ((can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump)))

locations.King Dodongo Heart:
(has_bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (can_reach(Adult_DC) or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
locations.King Dodongo:
(has_bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (can_reach(Adult_DC) or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
